Html:
Looking at Issue Tracker there seems to be quite some open issues with the Toolkit. Myself I am using DataGrid and DatePicker and I get exceptions pretty often, ie. from my perspective DataGrid is not yet seriously usable in the production environment.

Given that .net 4.0 is not expected in the near future, are you considering an interim fix-release for the toolkit? If yes, would you indicate any time-frame?

tnx

Hi snovik,

We do not currently have any definite plans for an interim release before .NET 4.0, but we are looking into the possibility.  Please see this thread for more details: http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=38679.

Thanks,
Samantha
